message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product at a price of $14,000. I believe this product would be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
I appreciate your interest, Bob. However, $10,000 is significantly below its true value. I could consider letting it go for $13,000.
I understand that the product is valuable, but I'm still not convinced that $13,000 is a fair price. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $11,500. That's the maximum I'm willing to pay.
